Control Name: Retains Personal Information—Personal information is retained for no longer than necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.

control_attributes.Control: Retains Personal Information—Personal information is retained for no longer than necessary to fulfill the stated purposes, unless a law or regulation specifically requires otherwise.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P4.2 The entity retains personal information consistent with the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
